desktop.title: Pricing
desktop.intro: Pair offers simple pricing for Free, Team, and Enterprise customers. For custom solutions of 10,000 Pair URLs per month, please contact customer@pairurl.com.

sections.content:
10 Pair Public URLs per month for $0.
• Public Pair URLS
• 100 Builds Per Month Limit
• Email Support

1,000 Pair Private URLs per month for $29 per user.
• Private Pair URLS
• 200 Builds Per Month Per User Limit
• Slack Support

10,000 Pair Private URLs per month for $49 per user.
• Private Pair URLS
• 1,000 Builds Per Month Per User Limit
• Slack & Phone Support
